PackageInfo.name: Orckestra.Web.BundlingAndMinification
PackageInfo.author: Orckestra
PackageInfo.description: The package is based on Microsoft ASP.NET Web Optimization framework. If you need support for SASS or LESS files, install the Orckestra.Web.Css.Sass or Orckestra.Web.Css.Less packages.Bundling and Minification of the Style and Javascript resources to improve site page request load time.
